Tell Sid he\u2019s a nonexistent totally fictitious dork created at a ridiculous cost to us taxpayers by the spectacularly unimaginative alcohol-sodden Mogadon-brained gnomes of some tinpot advertising agency in order to persuade thousands of upwardly mobile and extremely acquisitive I\u2019m-alright-Jack council-house-owning stone-cladding garden-gnome and MFI furniture-worshipping downmarket cut- price would-be J. Paul Gettys to open their poxy little piggy banks and invest their hard|®wned pennies in a public amenity which until very recently belonged to them anyway! TELL SID that it\u2019s not travellers who waste taxpayers\u2019 money as his amoeba-brained drinking mates seem to think but corrupt slimy government offi  cials who sell off our industries at knockdown prices to their corp  orate friends and puke-inducing scum in suits handed vastly profit  able public monopolies on a plate who then pay themselves vast salaries while sacking half their workforce! TELL SID that the only e reason the government wanted insignificant little nobodies like e him to indulge his pathetic Howard Hughes fantasies and grab a pitifully irrelevant handful of meaningless shares in the first place was so that they it could send him a threatening letter come elec  tion time telling him that should he have the effrontery to vote for the evil Libyan-sponsored Saddam Hussein-fellating child mol  esters of the Labour Party his tiny little pound of flesh would go up in smoke and that therefore out of sheer naked nude bare unadorned self-interest he should vote Conservative! This is exceptionally stupid and should stop RIGHT NOW. You rap about your GOLD and you rap about your CAR and you rap about what good rappers you are you rap about your GUNS and the money you make ^ and the size oft yourr OUNE--EYED TRKOUUSERK SINAKE vy Yonu savy it\u2019s bhifgfgser than the Albert Hall but I bet it\u2019s like an earthworm, very very small You say it\u2019s bigger than the Albert Hall but I bet it\u2019s like a maggot or you ain\u2019t got one at all! All you need is a camera, notebook and pen you write down a number, then you write one down again We\u2019re ignored by the nation, we go down the station and we\u2019ve got another hobby - masturbation But, of course, not all rappers conform to this crude stereotype! MC Trainspotter, the world\u2019s first rapping trainspotter, certainly doesn\u2019t...He knows you don\u2019t have to he really tough and live somewhere dangerous and have a gun and a hig penis to be a rapper! Boys in the Hood (Trainspotter Rap) MC Trainspotter, yeah, that\u2019s me - and this is my homeboy, Nice-T! Now some people think that trainspotting\u2019s rot... but me and my posse, we say H/hey, don\u2019t walk away, \u2019cos I\u2019m talking to you \"f /you know what they call us - The Platform 2 Live Crew! I\u2019ll phone ya! And at half time I\u2019ve got everything I need ' -j\\ A nice telephone directory to read MC Trainspotter in the house I\u2019ve got the suss, and I\u2019ve got the nous I don\u2019t live in a ghetto like those rappers in the States I like the police \u2014 'f yes, they\u2019re my best mates... 52 \n￼V7~~ down at the station just ask me, it\u2019ll fill me with elation!
